Prabhu et al. synthesised and studied the anticancer activities of oxothiazolidine based BTA derivatives. The substituted chlorophenyl oxothiazolidine based benzothiazole 53 ( Figure 33) showed the most effective anticancer activity against HeLa cell line, inducing 96.8% inhibition and IC 50 value of 9.76 µM, when compared with the reference drug cisplatin
54 .
